ICausticFactory.h

Primary interface through which clients talk to the Caustic factory.

ICausticFactory

Defines the main factory for creating Caustic objects

Functions
CreateRenderer
virtual void CreateRenderer(
HWND hwnd,
std::wstring &shaderFolder,
IRenderer **ppRenderer
) = 0

Creates our basic renderer object to be used by the client

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

HWND to attach D3D renderer to

ppRenderer
IRenderer**

Returns the created renderer

CreateRenderer creates the renderer object that the client will use to talk to the renderer. This object runs on the clients thread and acts only as a proxy for marshalling commands+data over to the renderer thread.

CreateRendererMarshaller
virtual void CreateRendererMarshaller(
IRendererMarshaller **ppMarshaller
) = 0

Creates the marshalled version of the renderer. This renderer marshals all calls over to the render thread (i.e. can be called on any thread)

CreateRenderable

IRenderSubMesh *pSubMesh,
IRenderMaterial *pFrontMaterial,

IRenderable **ppRenderable

CreateCamera
virtual void CreateCamera(
bool leftHanded,
ICamera **ppCamera
) = 0

Creates a new camera object. This camera can then be passed to IRenderer to be used for rendering.

Parameters
leftHanded
bool

Defines whether we have a left or right handed coordinate system
